entry.content:
Spacious studio in downtown Brooklyn low-rise with indoor pool and 2 gyms!!! NO FEE!!!

Listing ID #: 203716
Price: $2,350
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 700 Sq. Ft.
Pets: Pets OK

Spacious studio in downtown Brooklyn low-rise with indoor pool!!! All amenities included with rent!!! These residences showcase intuitive layouts, hardwood flooring and striking views through expansive floor-to-ceiling windows. Luxury Rentals Offering the Best of Downtown Introducing light, bright luxury rentals within the pulse of downtown Brooklyn. A Modern Design for Your Way of Life Understated yet eye-catching, this feat of tiered modern construction boasts striking residences, generous outdoor space and amenities fit for every lifestyle.

Sun-Drenched Modern Living Spaces Wrapped in a radiant glass façade and reinforced with a double-height Indiana limestone base, this beautiful property was built from the ground up to surpass any expectations of what rental living should be. The Building with Many Amenities All apartments feature spacious closets with custom shelving, integrated fiber-optic wiring and built-in surround-sound speakers with iPod/MP3 docking stations, while many also offer in-home washer/dryers, and outdoor terraces and balconies.

Offering Outdoor Sky Gardens and Roof Decks Light and airy, the residences at this beautiful property boast striking views through expansive floor-to-ceiling windows and abundant outdoor space. This property's richly-featured residences meld seamlessly with Brooklyn's nearby inspired cultural and culinary destinations.

Downtown is one of Brooklyn's fastest growing centers, where creativity, culture and convenience reign supreme. Work at MetroTech Commons, play at the Brooklyn Academy of Music. The excitement of Smith Street, the greenery of Fort Greene Park and the boutiques of Montague Street are just around the corner, as well as universities, schools and landmarks. And for all your forays into Manhattan and anywhere else, subways and LIRR options are minutes away. This property has amenities to suit every resident. Tenants can enjoy city views from outdoor sky gardens with landscaped roof decks, private cabanas and barbecue areas. This property also offers plenty to do inside at the oversized sky-lit indoor pool and top-of-the-line 6,000 SF fitness center. Those looking for a quiet night in will enjoy the resident lounge featuring a pool table, screening room and WiFi. This property also provides: Modern lobby with 24-hour concierge Covered on-site parking garage Valet services

Constantine (Konstantinos) Fourtounis
